insert into tbl_board(title, content, mno, cno, status, drno) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{mno}, #{cno}, #{status}, #{drno})
select max(bno) from tbl_board
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, moddate = now(), cno = #{cno}, status = #{status} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select:
select b.* from tbl_board b
order by bno DESC limit #{amount} offset #{offset}

select b.* from tbl_board b join tbl_donate_round dr on b.drno = dr.drno left join tbl_donate_action da on dr.drno = da.drno where b.status = 'ACTIVE' and dr.status = 'ACTIVE' group by b.bno, dr.voiddate, dr.goalamount having dr.goalamount - coalesce(sum(da.amount), 0) > 0 order by dr.voiddate limit 1
select * from tbl_board b where drno is not null and status = 'ACTIVE' and drno in (select drno from tbl_donate_round where status = 'ACTIVE') order by regdate desc limit 3
select * from tbl_board b where status = 'ACTIVE' and cno in (select cno from tbl_category where ctype = 'NOTICE') order by regdate desc limit 3
select * from tbl_board b where status = 'ACTIVE' and cno in (select cno from tbl_category where ctype = 'QNA') order by regdate desc limit 3
